description: This file defines a Python script that constructs and returns an 'Agent' object configured for a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) system. It includes imports, a function to instantiate the agent with specific models, knowledge base setup, and detailed instructions for the agent's behavior.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of processing queries, maintaining context, and utilizing knowledge bases and tools.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Encapsulates the knowledge base, including vector database and embedding model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Handles vector similarity search using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Manages persistent storage of agent sessions and related data in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides external search capabilities via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: get_agentic_rag_agent
methods.description: Constructs and returns a configured Agent object for a Retrieval Augmented Generation system with detailed instructions and knowledge base setup.
